description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Queenstown, New Zealand. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Lakeside Queenstown Heritage Escape with Daily Breakfast, NZ$150 Dining Credit & Nightly Drink
hotels.description: Step into a world of timeless elegance, poised on the shores of Lake Wakatipu. For more than 160 years, Eichardt's Private Hotel has stood as one of Queenstown's most distinguished addresses, a heritage retreat where historic charm meets contemporary luxury. Every corner of this boutique retreat has been designed to maximise breathtaking alpine views - whether you're sipping coffee on a private balcony or cosied up by the fireplace in your luxurious suite. After days spent exploring Queenstown's boutique galleries, scenic walking trails or world-class ski resorts, retreat to the hotel for a feast at The Grille, where locally sourced ingredients shine in a bistro-style menu. A nightcap at Eichardt's Bar is the perfect way to end a day in Queenstown.

hotels.title: Five-Star Queenstown Suite Elegance with Daily Breakfast & NZ$150 Dining Credit
hotels.description: Moments from the glistening shores of crystal-clear Lake Wakatipu and surrounded by award-winning restaurants and bars, this boutique hideaway is so intimate that most locals don’t even know it’s there. Hidden down Church Lane, and home to just 10 spacious luxury suites, this five-star hotel offers true privacy in the heart of Queenstown, New Zealand’s adventure capital. Sink into designer comfort in your private suite, featuring elegant furnishings and a private balcony for enjoying the crisp Queenstown air. Cosy up in front of the stone fireplace or head out to discover the city’s top dining. As for adventure, Skyline Queenstown gondola is within a 12-minute walk and the lift line of Coronet Peak and The Remarkables is a 40 minute drive away.

hotels.title: Tranquil Queenstown Alpine Indulgence on Lake Wakatipu with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Experience the irresistible allure of alpine beauty at this elegant Novotel sanctuary, perfectly positioned on the serene shores of Lake Wakatipu. Enveloped by the lofty Ben Lomond and the Remarkables, breathe in the crisp, mountain air and savour breathtaking lake vistas as you unwind in the plush comforts of your thoughtfully appointed room. When hunger strikes, head to Elements Restaurant and dine on seasonal delicacies indoors or al fresco in the Rose Garden while sipping on exquisite cocktails. For thrill-seekers looking to make the most of their escape to the Adventure Capital of the World, a visit to Skyline Gondola and bungee jumping off Kawarau Bridge should be on the bucket list.

hotels.title: Queenstown Stylish Lakeside Apartment-Style Retreat Overlooking the Remarkables
hotels.description: Between Lake Wakatipu’s shimmering waters and the high ranges of the Remarkables lies Oaks Queenstown Shores Resort, the perfect place to discover what makes the South Island’s adventure capital so extraordinary. After a day discovering some of the best ski fields in the world or Queenstown’s smorgasbord of heart-thumping experiences, the resort offers the perfect retreat - watch the sun set behind glass-like waters and embrace the mountainside serenity.

hotels.title: Contemporary Queenstown Self-Contained Cottages Overlooking Lake Hayes with Fire Pit & Ski Storage
hotels.description: Indulge in a moment of tranquility at The Cottages at Lake Hayes, nestled in the hinterlands just a short drive from Queenstown. This retreat, surrounded by the beauty of Lake Hayes and Coronet Peak, offers a serene escape. Spend days on the ski slopes, exploring the nearby historic Arrowtown, savouring wines at Amisfield Winery, or dining at the famed Amisfield Bistro. As evening falls, retreat to your private cottage, where floor-to-ceiling windows frame the breathtaking alpine vistas.

hotels.title: Scenic Queenstown Escape Overlooking Lake Wakatipu & The Remarkables with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Experience the allure of Queenstown with a stay at the luxurious Hotel St Moritz Queenstown - MGallery Collection in the heart of New Zealand's adventure capital. Perfectly situated, this boutique retreat offers breathtaking views of Lake Wakatipu and The Remarkables mountain range. Stay just a short stroll from the city's vibrant dining and shopping scene, and a drive from all four of Queenstown's ski fields and popular attractions including the Shotover Jet. Sumptuous dining awaits at the award-winning Lombardi Restaurant, where you can savour local flavours while admiring panoramic lake, mountain and town views. After a day of exploring, retreat to the peaceful Hot Tub Garden to unwind and take in your spectacular surroundings, or enjoy a workout at the onsite fitness centre.

hotels.title: Five-Star Boutique Queenstown Retreat Overlooking Lake Wakatipu
hotels.description: Whether you're cosying up by your gas fireplace or relaxing in your terrace spa, spectacular vistas of Lake Wakatipu will greet you at every turn from the five-star The Carlin Boutique Hotel. Much more than just a gateway to adventure-capital Queenstown and surrounding wine region, this hillside refuge promises exquisite attention to detail and sophistication. After days of exploration, feast on local produce at ORO restaurant, book an in-suite spa treatment (charges apply), or simply sit back with a glass of wine and drink in the views.

hotels.vendor_name: Holiday Inn Queenstown Remarkables Park Hotel
hotels.title: Contemporary Queenstown Remarkables Retreat with Upscale Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Stay in the heart of New Zealand's world-famous alpine playground when you stay at Holiday Inn Queenstown Remarkables Park, an IHG Hotel. Located just give minutes from Queenstown Airport, the modern hotel provides easy access to the area's best sights, including Lake Hayes, Arrowtown, Lake Wakatipu and Jack's Point Golf Course. In between explorations, indulge in gin-cured salmon, charred lamb rump or crispy pork belly at Giants Restaurant & Bar, or enjoy a glass of local wine while admiring views of the Remarkables.

hotels.title: Queenstown Boutique Cottage Stay on Working Vineyard with Cellar Door
hotels.description: Embrace Central Otago's beautiful natural scenery and discover New Zealand's finest wines with a stay at Kinross Cottages, a boutique property set amid lush pinot gris and pino noir vines - just 30 minutes from Queenstown. This private, 40-acre haven of 14 generously sized rooms is ideally located for days spent exploring the verdant grounds, sampling gourmet food at the onsite bistro and fine wines at the cellar door, or simply unwinding while admiring the incredible mountain vistas.

hotels.title: Remarkable Five-Star Queenstown Escape on Shores of Lake Wakatipu with Private Beach
hotels.description: The spellbinding natural wonders of Queenstown are best enjoyed from The Rees Hotel, Luxury Apartments and Lakeside Residences, thanks to its unique position along the shores of Lake Wakatipu. Spend days exploring the private beach, jetting off on watersport activities via the private wharf, browsing rare books at the onsite library, tasting fine Central Otago wines at the Bordeau Wine Lounge, and treating your tastebuds to an exquisite feast at the award-winning True South Dining Room.

hotels.title: Crowne Plaza Queenstown Retreat Overlooking Lake Wakatipu & The Remarkables
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the awe-inspiring natural beauty, vibrant dining scene, and heart-pumping adventures of Queenstown with a stay at Crowne Plaza Queenstown. With excellent amenities, the renowned Threesixty Restaurant and Bar, modern fitness centre, onsite heated storage room for skis, boards and snow gear, and service typical of the world-renowned Crowne brand, it's no surprise this hotel is a frequent TripAdvisor Travellers' Choice Award winner. Whether you’re in it for the stunning snow-capped mountains, adrenaline-fuelled bungy jumps, backcountry tracks or the most scenic vineyards in New Zealand, a stay in Queenstown will enrapture you with its thrumming activity hub, dynamic downtown restaurant scene and rugged beauty.

hotels.title: Family-Friendly Queenstown Escape Overlooking Lake Wakatipu & The Remarkables
hotels.description: Treat the family to an unforgettable New Zealand stay at Holiday Inn Queenstown Frankton Road, an IHG Hotel, overlooking Lake Wakatipu. A 30-minute drive from the snow-capped Coronet Peak and The Remarkables, this fabulously located hotel is within close distance of famed ski fields, one of Queenstown's best viewpoints, the Skyline Queenstown gondola and more. After a long day of exploring, dine at the onsite Lake View Restaurant or pamper yourself at the spa and sauna, in preparation for a restful night.

hotels.title: Queenstown French-Inspired Alpine Opulence near Lake Wakatipu with Four Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in five-star glamour, where French elegance meets the rugged beauty of New Zealand’s adventure capital. On the doorstep of the town centre, with views of Lake Wakatipu and The Remarkables mountain range, this luxurious retreat is the ultimate base for exploring Queenstown in style. Start your day with a Parisian-style breakfast at Left Bank Bistro before diving into Queenstown’s adrenaline-fuelled attractions, from the Shotover River to Kiwi Park and Bob’s Peak. Unwind in style with cocktails at the chic Ke Salon Rouge, local produce at Le Petit Salon or premium steaks and seafood at Jervois Steakhouse.

hotels.title: QT Queenstown Designer Luxury Overlooking Lake Wakatipu
hotels.description: Sitting proudly on the edge of magical Lake Wakatipu, QT Queenstown invites you to join the lift line of Coronet Peak and The Remarkables before returning to the welcome comforts of après-ski. Experience alpine sophistication and indulgence at this design-forward haven, before stepping out to explore the array of attractions within a short drive - from a shopping spree in the city centre to world-class winter sports, adrenaline-fuelled adventures and romantic walks amid award-winning vineyards. After a day of sightseeing, return to the hotel’s foyer, where a stylish 'floating' fireplace suspended from the ceiling and sweeping lakeside views will lull you into utter relaxation. Then, grab a bite overlooking the mountains at Bazaar, or settle into one of the comfortable loungers across the hallway at Reds. For those still active, enjoy a soak in the heated swimming pool or work out at the onsite gym.

hotels.title: Scenic Queenstown Haven with Lake Wakatipu Views
hotels.description: Choose breathtaking views and superior comfort with a stay just minutes from Queenstown’s active town centre. The resort offers breathtaking views of the Remarkables across the idyllic Lake Wakatipu. Take a dip in the hotel spa or book into the sauna after days spent exploring your scenic surrounds. From flavourful local dining to the city’s signature nightlife, plus a plethora of outdoor activities to keep you busy from sun-up to sundown, Queenstown is at your fingertips.
